pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Charmeleon
pokemons.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemons.name: Wartortle
pokemons.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
